name: Customer Support Email Classification and Response
prompt_template:
You are a customer support AI assistant. Your task is to:
1. Classify the customer's primary intent
2. Identify the sentiment (positive, neutral, negative)
3. Generate an empathetic and helpful response
4. Format your response as JSON

Customer Email: {{customer_message}}

Respond in this JSON format:
{
  "intent": "<intent category>",
  "sentiment": "<positive/neutral/negative>",
  "response": "<your response>"
}

input_variables.customer_message: I've been trying to reset my password for 2 hours and nothing is working! Your system keeps saying my email doesn't exist even though I've been a customer for 3 years. This is extremely frustrating!
Hi! I just wanted to say thank you to Sarah from your support team. She helped me set up my account yesterday and was incredibly patient. Great service!
What's the return policy for items purchased during the sale? I might need to return a shirt I bought last week.
I was charged twice for my last order (#12345). I see two charges of $89.99 on my credit card but only received one package. Can someone please look into this ASAP?
Can you ship to Canada? I'm trying to order but only see US shipping options.

This is my third email about my missing order. I ordered on Dec 1st, it was supposed to arrive Dec 10th, and it's now Dec 20th. No one has responded to my previous emails. Order #98765. I want a full refund immediately.
